message: No, that's adjustable. The physical size of the box is very minute
1280x800 (oldish laptop). I can see three lines at a time max, and chat is horribly laggy.
oh i see.. are you on a mobile device or small resolution comp?
Hard to read the chat. There are approximately ten users on it, and it's difficult to keep up because it's so small.

that is strange chat seems to be pretty snappy for me.. vertical spacing is a bit small sometimes and we will do something to change that only thing i can recommend is to not be zoomed in and have the browser window full.. sorry your are having trouble
I've told people if they want to talk to me, to join a particular Tinychat. It's hard to answer questions from a lot of people at once when you can't read more than a couple of lines :/
